1.0.name: wordpress/post-author-comment-notification
1.0.description: Overrides the wp_notify_moderator function located in pluggable.php. By default, wordpress does not notify a comment author of a moderation event. This plugin will look at all users in the blog, and notify anyone who can moderate the plugin, along with the admins and the author of that post. This has been tested and does work with WPMU as well.
